title: The Masterpiece of the Month: The Herring Net by Winslow Homer, Mr. and Mrs. Martin A. Ryerson Collection
description: During September 1940, a painting by Winslow Homer, the late 19th century American painter, was featured as Masterpiece of the Month. One of Homer’s most celebrated pieces, this painting was awarded a gold medal at the World’s Colombian Exposition in 1893, exhibited in both the Century of Progress Exhibition in 1933-1943 and the San Francisco Golden Gate Exposition in 1939.

input: The Masterpiece of the Month: The Herring Net by Winslow Homer, Mr. and Mrs. Martin A. Ryerson Collection
